exists(select 1 from inventory where hardresissue = :no and itemnum = invreserve.itemnum and location = invreserve.location and itemsetid = invreserve.itemsetid and siteid=invreserve.storelocsiteid) or ( exists(select 1 from inventory where hardresissue = :yes and itemnum = invreserve.itemnum and location = invreserve.location and itemsetid = invreserve.itemsetid and siteid=invreserve.storelocsiteid) and restype in (select value from synonymdomain where domainid='RESTYPE' and maxvalue in ('APHARD','HARD')) )
printthrulink = 1

mbofilter.filtercondition: parent is null

objectname in ('WORKORDER', 'WOACTIVITY', 'WOCHANGE', 'WORELEASE', 'SR', 'INCIDENT', 'PROBLEM') and status in (select value from synonymdomain where domainid = 'COMMTMPLTSTATUS' and maxvalue = 'ACTIVE') and ( usewith in (select value from synonymdomain where domainid = 'TEMPLATEUSEWITH' and maxvalue = 'APPS') or usewith in (select value from synonymdomain where domainid = 'TEMPLATEUSEWITH' and maxvalue = 'ALL') )

mbolookupfilter.filtercondition: objectname in ('WORKORDER', 'WOACTIVITY', 'WOCHANGE', 'WORELEASE', 'SR', 'INCIDENT', 'PROBLEM') and status in (select value from synonymdomain where domainid = 'COMMTMPLTSTATUS' and maxvalue = 'ACTIVE') and ( usewith in (select value from synonymdomain where domainid = 'TEMPLATEUSEWITH' and maxvalue = 'APPS') or usewith in (select value from synonymdomain where domainid = 'TEMPLATEUSEWITH' and maxvalue = 'ALL') )

mbofilter.filtercondition: (objectname in ('WORKORDER', 'WOACTIVITY', 'WOCHANGE', 'WORELEASE', 'INCIDENT', 'PROBLEM', 'SR') or objectname is null)

itemtype IN (SELECT value FROM synonymdomain WHERE maxvalue = 'ITEM' AND domainid = 'ITEMTYPE') AND (itemnum IN (SELECT itemnum FROM itemorginfo WHERE status IN (SELECT value FROM synonymdomain WHERE domainid = 'ITEMSTATUS' AND maxvalue = 'ACTIVE')) OR itemnum IN (SELECT itemnum FROM inventory WHERE status IN (SELECT value FROM synonymdomain WHERE domainid = 'ITEMSTATUS' AND maxvalue IN ('ACTIVE','PENDOBS'))))

mbolookupfilter.filtercondition: itemtype IN (SELECT value FROM synonymdomain WHERE maxvalue = 'ITEM' AND domainid = 'ITEMTYPE') AND exists ( select 1 from inventory where ($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.STORELOC = '') OR (itemnum=item.itemnum AND location = $MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.STORELOC and siteid = $MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.SITEID)) AND (($MOBILE_WORKORDER.ORGID != '' AND itemnum IN (SELECT itemnum FROM itemorginfo WHERE orgid = $MOBILE_WORKORDER.ORGID AND status IN (SELECT value FROM synonymdomain WHERE domainid = 'ITEMSTATUS' AND maxvalue = 'ACTIVE'))) OR ((itemnum IN (SELECT itemnum FROM inventory WHERE status IN (SELECT value FROM synonymdomain WHERE domainid = 'ITEMSTATUS' AND maxvalue IN ('ACTIVE','PENDOBS')))) AND (($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.STORELOC = '' AND $MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.BINNUM = '' AND $MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.LOTNUM = '') OR (itemnum IN (SELECT itemnum FROM invbalances WHERE ($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.STORELOC = '' OR ($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.STORELOC != '' AND location = $MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.STORELOC)) AND ($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.BINNUM = '' OR ($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.BINNUM != '' AND binnum = $MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.BINNUM)) AND ($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.LOTNUM = '' OR ($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.LOTNUM != '' AND lotnum = $MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.LOTNUM)))))))

itemtype IN (SELECT value FROM synonymdomain WHERE maxvalue = 'ITEM' AND domainid = 'ITEMTYPE') AND exists ( select 1 from inventory where ($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.STORELOC = '') OR (itemnum=item.itemnum AND location = $MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.STORELOC and siteid = $MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.SITEID)) AND (($MOBILE_WORKORDER.ORGID != '' AND itemnum IN (SELECT itemnum FROM itemorginfo WHERE orgid = $MOBILE_WORKORDER.ORGID AND status IN (SELECT value FROM synonymdomain WHERE domainid = 'ITEMSTATUS' AND maxvalue = 'ACTIVE'))) OR ((itemnum IN (SELECT itemnum FROM inventory WHERE status IN (SELECT value FROM synonymdomain WHERE domainid = 'ITEMSTATUS' AND maxvalue IN ('ACTIVE','PENDOBS')))) AND (($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.STORELOC = '' AND $MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.BINNUM = '' AND $MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.LOTNUM = '') OR (itemnum IN (SELECT itemnum FROM invbalances WHERE ($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.STORELOC = '' OR ($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.STORELOC != '' AND location = $MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.STORELOC)) AND ($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.BINNUM = '' OR ($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.BINNUM != '' AND binnum = $MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.BINNUM)) AND ($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.LOTNUM = '' OR ($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.LOTNUM != '' AND lotnum = $MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.LOTNUM)))))))

itemtype IN (SELECT value FROM synonymdomain WHERE maxvalue = 'ITEM' AND domainid = 'ITEMTYPE') AND exists ( select 1 from inventory where ($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.STORELOC is null) OR (itemnum=item.itemnum AND location = $MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.STORELOC and siteid = $MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.SITEID)) AND (($MOBILE_WORKORDER.ORGID is not null AND itemnum IN (SELECT itemnum FROM itemorginfo WHERE orgid = $MOBILE_WORKORDER.ORGID AND status IN (SELECT value FROM synonymdomain WHERE domainid = 'ITEMSTATUS' AND maxvalue = 'ACTIVE'))) OR ((itemnum IN (SELECT itemnum FROM inventory WHERE status IN (SELECT value FROM synonymdomain WHERE domainid = 'ITEMSTATUS' AND maxvalue IN ('ACTIVE','PENDOBS')))) AND (($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.STORELOC is null AND $MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.BINNUM is null AND $MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.LOTNUM is null) OR (itemnum IN (SELECT itemnum FROM invbalances WHERE ($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.STORELOC is null OR ($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.STORELOC is not null AND location = $MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.STORELOC)) AND ($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.BINNUM is null OR ($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.BINNUM is not null AND binnum = $MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.BINNUM)) AND ($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.LOTNUM is null OR ($MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.LOTNUM is not null AND lotnum = $MOBILE_MATUSETRANS.LOTNUM)))))))
itemnum in (select itemnum from inventory where status in (select value from synonymdomain where domainid='ITEMSTATUS' and (maxvalue='ACTIVE' or maxvalue='PENDOBS')))
type in (select value from synonymdomain where domainid='LOCTYPE' and maxvalue in ('STOREROOM','LABOR','COURIER'))
